<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a custom navigation item by the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"Item ID","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
